author: remm
msg: - It should now be possible to retry a PUT method.
- The bahavior of some of the calls was a bit modified :
- add a new sendData(URL) method, which will upload the contents of the
resource which can be retrieved at the given URL.
- sendData(InputStream) will now buffer all the contents of the given InputStream
into a byte array in memory. To send large amounts of data, I recommend first
buffering the data to a file, and then sending the file.

author: remm
msg: - Readd the two Webdav client tests.

author: remm
msg: - Move all tests to a single location.

author: juergen
msg: forgot to remove two printlns. Slide come now up, if the logger is not present in domain.xml.

author: remm
msg: - Allow the WebdavMethod.executeMethod() to throw IOException.
- Added streaming capabilities to the XML writer.
- Updated Propfind to take advantage of this.
